å¯¹è¾“å…¥å›¾åƒ $$ I \in \mathbb{R}^{H \times W} $$ å’Œå·ç§¯æ ¸ $$K \in \mathbb{R}^{k \times k} $$ ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºç‰¹å¾å›¾ $$ O $$ åœ¨ä½ç½® $$ (i,j) $$ çš„å€¼ä¸ºï¼š

2.3 è¾“å‡ºå°ºå¯¸è®¡ç®—å…¬å¼

ç»™å®šï¼š

ğŸ“Œ å¸¸ç”¨è®¾ç½®ï¼šK=3, S=1, P=1 â†’ å°ºå¯¸ä¸å˜ï¼›K=3, S=2, P=1 â†’ å°ºå¯¸å‡åŠ

3.1 å·ç§¯å±‚ï¼ˆConv Layerï¼‰â€”â€”ä¸æ­¢æ˜¯â€œæ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£â€

3.3 æ± åŒ–å±‚ â€”â€” ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆMax Poolingæœ€å¸¸ç”¨ï¼Ÿ

Max Pooling vs Average Pooling

3.4 æ‰¹å½’ä¸€åŒ–ï¼ˆBatch Normalization, BNï¼‰â€”â€”è®­ç»ƒåŠ é€Ÿç¥å™¨

class CNN(nn.Module): def init(self): super(CNN, self).init() self.features = nn.Sequential( nn.Conv2d(3, 32, 3, padding=1), nn.BatchNorm2d(32), nn.ReLU(), nn.MaxPool2d(2), nn.Conv2d(32, 64, 3, padding=1), nn.BatchNorm2d(64), nn.ReLU(), nn.MaxPool2d(2), nn.Conv2d(64, 128, 3, padding=1), nn.BatchNorm2d(128), nn.ReLU(), nn.AdaptiveAvgPool2d((1, 1)) # GAP ) self.classifier = nn.Sequential( nn.Dropout(0.5), nn.Linear(128, 10) )
